p: The same arithmetic mean and standardization procedures were used to calculate and aggregate all the indices of the methodological scheme in the final step. Accordingly, the MVI was constructed by the combination of its main indices–Vind and CSI. Likewise, VInd was formed by the combination of its three components—exposure, sensitivity and adaptive capacity—and the CSI was constructed by the aggregation of its climatic indices of temperature and precipitation anomalies ( Fig 4). Thus, MVI represents, specifically, the current vulnerability to future climate change across the municipalities of the state of Amazonas.
